signals.problem_statement: The customer needs automation to assign emails to the correct department without manual intervention.
signals.context: Handling customer emails related to flight cancellations and rescheduling, with multiple departments involved.

signals.problem_statement: The customer requires AI capabilities to track SLA breaches and automate notifications to team leaders.
signals.context: Managing email responses and ensuring timely follow-ups for customer queries.

signals.problem_statement: The customer is looking for a writing assistant feature to help agents draft emails with fewer grammatical errors.
signals.context: Agents frequently write emails to customers and need assistance to improve clarity and professionalism.

signals.problem_statement: The customer wants a feature that automatically opens a new email for agents after they close a current one.
signals.context: Agents are handling multiple emails and need a more efficient workflow to manage their tasks.

signals.problem_statement: The customer needs a way to summarize long email threads to quickly understand the main issues.
signals.context: Dealing with complex customer inquiries that involve multiple back-and-forth emails.

signals.problem_statement: The customer is interested in integrating their backend system with Hiver to pull relevant data for email prioritization.
signals.context: Managing customer inquiries related to travel dates and cancellations that require timely responses.
